name: Danger Rooms
description:
A simple 2d arcade in which the player will have to go through a maze and avoid various traps. The game has a total of 10 levels of varying degrees of difficulty. Try to complete them all!

PC, Mac & Linux Standalone version will be added soon...

The game will be further developed. All found bugs will be fixed. Will be added in the future: 

1) Achievements;

2) Skins for the main character;

 3) More animation effects;

 4) New levels.
